content: Today I was working with a patch section patching one crate to a git branch, and updating it a few times with cargo update -p. It seemed like rust-analyzer wasn't quite catching up with those updates, as in like documentation thingies being out of date or fields staying "white" instead of "blue" (VS Code default theme). Is it possible there is a bug there? Should I file?
there's a bug for it already, updates to Cargo.toml outside of VSCode are not tracked
